            AGRICULTURAL DEVELOPMENT PROJECT,TF033090-ARGENTINA - PROVINCIAL

abstracts.cdata!:
The objectives of the Additional
            Financing (AF) for the Provincial Agricultural Development
            Project for Argentina are: to increase and diversify
            agricultural production and exports through intensifying
            land use, increasing productivity per hectare, and
            introducing new crops and modern varieties; and to increase
            and stabilize the agricultural incomes of about 120,000
            small and medium-sized commercial farms. The approval of the
            AF was based on the good performance of the original loan
            over the past few years, and to cover a financing gap of
            ongoing activities while the Bank and the Government of
            Argentina (GoA) conducted a dialogue regarding a second
            phase of the project. The reallocation is necessary to
            accommodate the larger than expected costs for works, and
            expenditures in consultant's and non-consultant
            services and training (due to the extension of the project
            closing date in 2008 by 18 months), by lowering the
            allocation for goods and recurrent costs.
